name: Wandering Owl
description:
Did you know that hawks afraid owls at night? But at the same time, owls afraid them at noon.
So once, one hot clear day, storm broke out and little Owl lost her nest. Now, You need help to find new home for the poor Owl till the end of the night.
  • Steam Achivements
  • Trading Cards
Current features
  • 10 hard levels
  • Good and calm sounds of nature
  • Simple control
  • Unusual and sweet graphics
  • Deaths' count which will help you to gain Achivements and compete with your friends for the best result!

It's out first game, we tried very hard!


Good luck and enjoy it!
